title: Account was logged in from another computer (not me)
body: My account was logged in from another computer, but I only use this one comp. I changed my password, but is that enough? Do I report this to Riot, and if so how so.

replies.body: I'd suggest reaching out to our account team as soon as you can to make sure your account is still secure. Hit them up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help repair any damage that might have been done while you're there ^_^!
Ok, thank you :D. I sent a ticket to them.
